name: 3011: An Office Space Odyssey
description:
Our Global Game Jam 2020 game for the theme 'Repair' using the 'Game Played In A Spreadsheet' Diversifier; 3011: An office space odyssey is the long-awaited sequel to 3010: An office space odyssey.

After leaving their respective jobs of 'Astronaut' and 'Office Worker', our two main characters get transferred to the CONTROL Z-MODULE intergalactic spaceship as 'Space Janitor' and 'Space Accountant'. Some space boredom ensues and the ship is in dire need of repairs!

Envisioned as a multiplayer game, one player will use a spreadsheet to edit and view values while the other explores a vast ship, solving puzzles with the help of their teammate.
